metadata.title: What Do You Play Games For? Their Answers

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge a boy wearing a pirate hat at the wheel of a ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around a tattered ship
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
A sakura blossom falls into Wethermon's crumbling hand.
Text, 41, What Do You Play Games For? Their Answers
Katzo punches the serpent.
She jumps and spin kicks it int he face. She lands on the shore.
The serpent roars and flicks its tail.
Cloud of dust
She runs up the serpent's body
She punches the serpent in the face.
It roars, and a shockwave descends across its body. It disappears in red pixels.
Text, Level up, 52 arrow 53
She picks up a Lifestide Scale and polishes it.
She baits a crawfish and casts a line into the Tearlight lake
In a flashback, Wethermon swings a sword. Katzo ducks.
She stares at the water. Scenes from the Wethermon fight flicker across the surface.
Red light fills the cavern. A bubble emerges from the water and reveals Wethermon
Red water drips from his cracked armor
He takes a quick draw stance
She raises her fists. In an instant, he lunges, sword raised high.
In the blue glow of the Tearlight lake, Katzo stares distantly
Pencilgon throws her spear at Kirin. Sunraku swings his moon blade at Wethermon
She pulls a line with a fish, being eaten by the serpent, being eaten by a giant red crustacean
Rare Enemy, Lifestide Destrobster
Destrobster swings its claws
It blocks with its claw
Katzo flies back
With glowing red fists, she charges
Text, Simultaneously, Hidden Garden
Red spider lilies sway
Pencilgon stares at the tombstone
She sets down a vase of Setsuna Towa blossoms
Thirdrema. A butler bows in an ornate hallway lined with paintings
Debt: 500 million
They descend stairs. The butler gestures to heavy doors
The alliance meeting
She looks at several spears. She spins one around.
The player glares.
Dialog, Cash on Hand, -387,965,000
She looks at the gravestone labelled Setsuna Amatsuki. Dialog, Log out?
The armory
Lies
Total lies
He imagines
He transfers ownership to her
She leaves.
He rounds a corner. She's gone.
Pencilgon walks down the street
The buildings in Thirdrema have orange tiled roofs. Most buildings are white stone with Tudor style wood paneling.
Pencilgon walks to the edge of a scenic overlook
She touches her hair pin. Sakura blossoms emerge and fly in a line ahead of her.
She touches the hair pin. Petals float in a line ahead of her.
Utopia headquarters, at night
A sleek car pulls up. Text, Present Day.
Sakai, wearing brown shoes, a brown suit, and a geometric pattenred blue tie, gets out of the car. He enters the building, and presses the down button at the elevator banks.
Utopia Head of PR Division, Sakai Tsukuyogi
He imagines his coworkers fighting
He clutches his stomach.
He looks at his full bottle of Chinese Herbal Medicine
He has short black hair and black rimmed glasses. Sweating, he steps into the elevator.
Sakai stands in front of the Original Text Reference Room
Ritsu stands at the desk. Tsukuri peers from behind her monitor.
Founder, World Creative Administrator, Tsukuyo Tsukuri
Executive Producer, Ritsu Amachi
Tsukuyo headbutts Ritsu
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds blue blades and stands in an underwater town.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across an underwater town. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
A red ship floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. A person in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
